content.text: Hello there! I am not very social, and I am staying home this weekend to avoid spiders. What about you?
Hello! I am trying to balance my school work with my social life and my workouts. I love a good stew, coffee, and creating content for my YouTube channel.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I would not be able to handle all of that at once. I love reading, and I plan to spend my retirement reading all the books I never had time for.
That is a great plan! I love to read, but I do not have enough time for it. I do not like waking up early, but I have to do it for school.
I am not a morning person either. I have to force myself to wake up early for work.
I am trying to become a nicer person. I am not sure if I am succeeding, but I am trying my best!
That is great! I am not a nice person either, but I am working on it.
I am living with my parents right now, but I could move out if I wanted to. They do not want me to move out, though.
I am living with my parents, too. I do not want to move out, but I am not sure if I will have a choice.
I love lasagna, but my family are all pizza-lovers. I am not sure if they would be happy if I gave up my lasagna addiction!
I love lasagna too! I do not like pizza, so I do not have to worry about that!
